players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
You: "I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Charlie: "I am the detective and I investigated Diana last night. She is the mafioso. Bob is lying to protect her."

Diana: "I am not the mafioso and I believe Charlie's story is false. He was the one who investigated me, it doesn't make sense that he would find any evidence against himself. Also, Bob's story seems more believable to me."
You: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and investigated him. He is mafioso. Diana is confirmed innocent by my investigation."
Charlie: "I am the detective. Bob is lying to protect Diana. Vote Diana to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
